title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Experiencing pain? Sanjay Gupta explains why 'It Doesn't Have to Hurt'
items.description: Gupta's new book examines the world of pain — why we feel it, and how we can treat it. He says distraction and meditation can be useful tools for mana...

items.title: The U.S. is designating Ecuador's largest gangs as terrorists
items.description: The U.S. is designating Ecuador's two largest gangs — Los Choneros and Los Lobos — as foreign terrorist organizations.

items.title: Quakes on Mars Reveal New Features of the Planet’s Interior
items.description: Using data from NASA’s retired InSight lander, two separate teams of researchers found evidence of a sluggish Martian mantle and a solid inner core.

items.title: Harvard Won Its Money Back, but Will It Actually Get It?

items.title: Why the medical community is thrilled by U.S. support for a 'breakthrough' HIV drug
items.description: Lenacapavir has the potential to end the HIV epidemic, researchers say. The Trump administration says backing this kind of effort will be a model for ...

items.title: Europe Aims to Show It Is Ready to Secure Postwar Ukraine
items.description: President Emmanuel Macron of France hosted a meeting of leaders to review options for protecting any peace with Russia.

items.title: Macron Said That 26 Countries Would Secure Ukraine
items.description: The pledges were made in Paris at a summit designed to show that Europe is ready to uphold any future peace deal for Ukraine.

items.title: Time Is Running Out for Lebanon to Disarm Hezbollah, U.S. Officials Warn
items.description: The United States, Israel and the Gulf Arab states are pressuring Lebanon’s government to act decisively against the group.
